item.title: OCaml Weekly News, 17 Nov 2020
item.description:
1. latest batteries release: v3.2.0
  2. OCaml User Survey 2020
  3. VSCode OCaml Platform v1.4.0
  4. Directories, an ocaml library
  5. Lwt vs System threads
  6. OCaml for ARM MacOS
  7. Introduction to the module system
  8. Getting resulting sig and struct of a complex modular program
  9. New release of ocaml-r
  10. Reflections on my first completed application in OCaml
  11. Help needed testing decimal package
  12. OCaml 4.12.0, first alpha release
  13. Experimental new layout for the ocaml-variants packages in opam-repository
  14. Messages, a library for type safe encoding and decoding
